## Videos 
- Welcome to the "R for Research" series! In this video, we will dive into the fundamentals of R, a powerful programming language and environment widely used in research and data analysis.R provides comprehensive tools and packages for statistical analysis, data visualization, and data manipulation. Whether you're a biologist, social scientist, or any researcher looking to harness the power of data, this series will equip you with the necessary skills to leverage R for your research projects.!
